text:
3 Tips to Stay Happy & Healthy This Summer
By Jennifer Milner|Tuesday, June 21, 2016
The weather is warming up and everyone is heading outside to make the most of these 93 sweet days. And with more time outdoors, there are a few more precautions to take that will help you avoid summertime illnesses. Here are three things to consider when heading outdoors over the next few months:
Some good rules to follow:
Generally speaking, insect bites should be handled by removing the stinger, if present; thoroughly clean the area; apply ice if there is swelling; hydrocortisone and Benedryl can be added for additional swelling, pain and minor allergic reactions. If a reaction is severe, such as difficulty breathing or swallowing, youll want to call 911 right away.
